faqs.question: How can I get a certain shirt?
faqs.answer: You need to purchase that menu item more.

faqs.question: Do you offer international shipping?
faqs.answer: No, we only ship to locations on Caltech campus.

faqs.question: How do I track my order?
faqs.answer: Sadly, this is not a real storefront. Perhaps someday!

faqs.question: Can I cancel my order after it has been placed?
faqs.answer: Orders can only be canceled within 1 hour of placement.
